reviews.name: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Media Viewer, 4.3" Color Display
reviews.reviewText: The card reader would be just what I wanted if you could delete all the pictures at once. If you have 50 pictures on the card and you view them you can only delete one at a time. That is a lot of work in the field. So you need to take a spare card for the camera and take the exist card home to delete with the computer or some other device such as a camera. Since I will have to use my camera to clear the card I have no need for the card reader.
reviews.title: Not what I wanted

reviews.name: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Media Viewer, 4.3" Color Display
reviews.reviewText: Great display! You CAN delete all the pictures at one time, but you have to go into advanced settings. I got this for my dad, and my brother and husband were in awe! Easy to use, especially for my technologically handicapped father lol. Perfect gift... and now everyone wants one!
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.name: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Media Viewer, 4.3" Color Display
reviews.reviewText: I love it.. It a little pricy for a SD card reader in my mind but I waited for a sale and I'm happy I did. I think best one on the market that I have see or used in my group of hunters.
reviews.title: Great SD reader

reviews.name: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Media Viewer, 4.3" Color Display
reviews.reviewText: I like the unit , only wish deleting pictures was more user friendly . Have to do one at a time.
reviews.title: Card reader

reviews.name: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad Media Viewer, 4.3" Color Display
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product, very easy to use.
reviews.title: Wildgame Innovations Trail Pad
